greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(n) such that 3^m == 1 mod n, or 0 if no such number exists.
mathematica: Table[SelectFirst[Range[EulerPhi[n]],PowerMod[3,# ,n]==1&,0],{n,80}] (* The program uses the SelectFirst function from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 18 2015 *)
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [Modorder(3, n): n in [2..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 01 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
